headline: PepsiCo (PEP) Gets Price Target Lift at Barclays as 2026 Outlook Comes Into Focus
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) is included among the 15 Best Blue-Chip Stocks with Growing Dividends. On December 11, Barclays raised its price target on PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) to $144 from $142, keeping an Equal Weight rating. The firm said the company “aimed to convey greater conviction and visibility” into its 2026 outlook, which mostly matches what […]

headline: Honeywell (HON): Valuation Check After Indra Nooyi Joins the Board of Directors
summary: Honeywell International (HON) just gave investors something new to chew on by appointing former PepsiCo chief Indra Nooyi to its board, a high profile governance move that could subtly reshape long term strategy. See our latest analysis for Honeywell International. The timing is interesting too, with Honeywell’s share price at $197.45 after a 1 day share price return of 1.96 percent and a year to date share price return of negative 12.45 percent. The 5 year total shareholder return of 11.61...

headline: Pepsi Worked to Keep Prices Higher at Retailers to Protect Walmart, FTC Found
summary: The allegations were made in an FTC lawsuit, dropped in May by the Trump administration, that was recently unsealed.

raw.headline: Pepsi Worked to Keep Prices Higher at Retailers to Protect Walmart, FTC Found
raw.summary: The allegations were made in an FTC lawsuit, dropped in May by the Trump administration, that was recently unsealed.

headline: BIC: Evolution of Société BIC’s Board of Directors composition
summary: Evolution of Société BIC’s Board of Directors composition Clichy, France – December 16, 2025 – During its meeting held today, and upon recommendation of the Nominations, Governance and CSR Committee, the Board of Directors unanimously decided to coopt Karen Guerra to replace Carole Callebaut Piwnica who, for personal reasons, asked to be discharged from her role as Independent Director and Chair of the Remuneration Committee and member of the Nominations, Governance and CSR Committee. Karen Guer

Karen Guer

headline: Is PepsiCo's Innovation Pipeline Strong Enough to Reaccelerate Growth?
summary: PEP is leaning on a robust innovation pipeline, from protein and GLP-1 products to clean-label snacks, to reignite growth as tastes shift.

headline: FTC claimed Walmart got unfair pricing advantages from PepsiCo
summary: In the newly unsealed complaint, the agency alleged the retailer got preferential pricing and promotions from the CPG giant.
